DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial determine whether new centrally act analgesic effective comparison placebo active comparator ( morphine ) .
DOC.criteria: Subjects schedule undergo primary unilateral first metatarsal bunionectomy Contraindications , history allergy hypersensitivity morphine , fentanyl , hydrocodone , acetaminophen , heparin , polyethylene glycol 400 USPNF compound plan used anesthesia , excipients . Concomitant inflammatory disease . Lifelong history seizure disorder epilepsy . Subjects impaired renal function Subjects impair hepatic function Female subject pregnant breastfeeding . Resting pulse rate < 50bpm > 100 bpm 5 minute rest supine position rest blood pressure 5 minute rest supine position : Systolic blood pressure < 100mmHg > 140 mmHg Diastolic blood pressure < 60 mmHg > 90 mmHg
